amendment.description: To regulate assault weapons, to ensure that the right to keep and bear arms is not unlimited, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 711, under the order of 4/16/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 60. Record Vote Number: 101.

action.text: Amendment SA 711 proposed by Senator Feinstein.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 711, under the order of 4/16/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 60. Record Vote Number: 101.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 711, under the order of 4/16/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 60. Record Vote Number: 101.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 711 proposed by Senator Feinstein.
